title: Shepherd's lost-his-sheep pie
ingredients: ['1kg (2 lb 4 oz) potatoes, cut into chunks', '500g bag frozen Quorn® mince', '1 large carrot, finely chopped', '1 large onion, finely chopped', '1 medium parsnip or turnip, finely chopped', '1 medium courgette, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons milk', '5 heaped teaspoons Bisto® Vegetable Gravy Granules', '15g (1/2 oz) butter (optional)', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper']
